verses.text: And he said unto him, Why callest thou me good? there is none good but one, that is, God: but if thou wilt enter into life, keep the commandments.

Thou shalt not steal; and he that stealeth and will not repent shall be cast out.

Thy father and thy mother shall be glad, and she that bare thee shall rejoice.
Thou shalt love thy neighbor as thyself. Thou shalt not steal; neither commit adultery, nor kill, nor do anything like unto it.
Let the iniquity of his fathers be remembered with the Lord; and let not the sin of his mother be blotted out.

Thou shalt not hate thy brother in thine heart: thou shalt in any wise rebuke thy neighbour, and not suffer sin upon him.
Devise not evil against thy neighbour, seeing he dwelleth securely by thee.

verses.text: The young man saith unto him, All these things have I kept from my youth up: what lack I yet?

similars.text: For all those things hath mine hand made, and all those things have been, saith the Lord: but to this man will I look, even to him that is poor and of a contrite spirit, and trembleth at my word.

And now remember, my son, that God has entrusted you with these things, which are sacred, which he has kept sacred, and also which he will keep and preserve for a wise purpose in him, that he may show forth his power unto future generations.

Because thou hast not remembered the days of thy youth, but hast fretted me in all these things; behold, therefore I also will recompense thy way upon thine head, saith the Lord God: and thou shalt not commit this lewdness above all thine abominations.
For thou writest bitter things against me, and makest me to possess the iniquities of my youth.

verses.text: Jesus said unto him, If thou wilt be perfect, go and sell that thou hast, and give to the poor, and thou shalt have treasure in heaven: and come and follow me.

verses.text: But when the young man heard that saying, he went away sorrowful: for he had great possessions.

verses.text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples, Verily I say unto you, That a rich man shall hardly enter into the kingdom of heaven.

And behold, he preached the word unto your fathers, and a mighty change was also wrought in their hearts, and they humbled themselves and put their trust in the true and living God. And behold, they were faithful until the end; therefore they were saved.

verses.text: But Jesus beheld them, and said unto them, With men this is impossible; but with God all things are possible.
